::Striker::

"No!" Striker yells as he sees his shot hit Spears in the back, 
looking at Prebon in fury as Spears collapsed.

His shoulder blasters continue firing at Prebon as he jumps forward
in 
an attempt to get Spears. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Spears::
> 
> She opened her eyes and saw Striker aim at Prebon.  "NO PLEASE! 
> DON'T!"  She moved to try to cover Prebon.  She didn't get in front 
> of Prebon to get the first shot.  But she moved infront of him in 
> time to catch the second shot in the back. She stopped and looked
at 
> Prebon for a second, then collapsed onto the floor.  She had wires 
> exposed on her back and leaking.  She groaned a little lay on her 
> side on the floor.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Striker::
> > 
> > Striker's eyes narrow, the bot sneering at Prebon. "You think 
> Zardus 
> > will be defeated by a simple chip and a gestalt? Or Megatron for 
> that 
> > matter? You underestimate both."
> > 
> > A growl escapes his lips as he watches Spears lean her head 
against 
> > Prebon's shoulder, his emotion circuits reactivating. Suddenly, 
> both 
> > his shoulder blasters take aim at Prebon, one firing at the bot's
> > head 
> > and the other at his chest. Striker was in a fury, rational 
thought 
> > mostly gone from his head.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> > > OOC: Sorry Yanshosh. I thought he said it out loud. I'll just 
say
> > in 
> > > this post that it was a guess, so that if it was right Striker 
> > > would've felt without that option. And the door to Striker's 
cell
> > is 
> > > open right now. Ignatius opened it. And Code, their in a 
mountain 
> > > with may tunnels and their at the top. You can't just talk, 
cause 
> > > they won't here you. Scan the mountain for technology and when 
> you 
> > > find stuff just send a comm message. No word on Bob Skir yet. 
> > > Probably forgot about us.
> > > 
> > > Trainers
> > > 
> > > Prebon gazed at Spears
> > > 
> > > "I don't want to have to give you the order, but it's all up to 
> > > Striker here."
> > > 
> > > Prebon looked at him. He was hoping Striker would do something 
> when 
> > > he said he knew about his self destruct program, so Prebon
would 
> > know 
> > > if he really has one on, but he didn't flinch. He could probably
> > put 
> > > Striker out now, but he wouldn't know if he would explode or 
not.
> > He 
> > > had to go with what he had.
> > > 
> > > "Striker, you don't understand, do you? The Maximals are only
my 
> > > first plan. If that fails, I'm sure their are other groups that 
> > would 
> > > fall for it. The minute you leave this ship though, Savage
would 
> be 
> > > waiting. And he wouldn't be happy. He hates you with all his 
> soul, 
> > > and he's nearly killed you before. He'll put you in stasis lock,
> > and 
> > > than you explode. He'll probably get really hurt, but he's tough
> > and 
> > > will survive after rehibilitation. It's not worth it Striker. 
You 
> > can 
> > > go free. And I also made a promise to Spears that if she serves 
> me 
> > > well in the recent future, I may release her. This is the only 
> > chance 
> > > you'll get! I'm not an evil sorcerer. I'm only looking out for 
my 
> > > groups best interests. This is your only chane of survival and
> > love. 
> > > Take it!"
> > > 
> > 
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> > > 
> > > Vulois
> > > 
> > > Vulois looked at Child.
> > > 
> > > "Yes I know. We have to work, or all is lost."
> > > 
> > > He turned back to Windrazor, Terradive and Afterburner.
> > > 
> > > "I'll show you. Follow me." Vulois entered the base with Child
> > still 
> > > in his arms.
> > > 
> > 
>

> > >

> > >

> > > 
> > > "You've got to go help some Alliance guys beat Maximals. I'll 
> meet

> > > 
> > > "Got it!"
> > >

> > > 
> > > "Phobia, it's Starscream. Zardus has agreed to loan us the 
entire 
> > > Oblitercon force for our battle. They form a giant bot, 
remember? 
> > But 
> > > in return for this I have to go fight in one of their battles.
I 
> > will 
> > > contact you when I come back to the Alliance base."
> > > 
> > > Starscream left for the battle.
> > > 
> > > Gotron sent his own message.
> > > 
> > > "Wheeljack, this is Gotron. Zardus told me to aid you in 
> retrieving 
> > > the probe
